body: so ash decided to grow up huh?
Clair best pokewaifu! Shame there is so little of smut of her.
The art is great but I heard the person who draw these is a big douche
I hate knowing the fact that looks like ash who might be a 50+ old guy who does not age?
We want more mha :D! Great job BTW

@Prince IST
First of all it might not be summer yet where juna is so they haven't started making it yet, he has NEVER PROMISED ANYTHING about my harem academia, and if you knew how long it takes to create manga you'll know that making a 40+ page manga FULL COLOR takes so much time it's actually crazy this person doesn't get more money. The manga industry is a crazy place of deadlines man and I also wish I could get more boku no harem but writing a comment like yours just demotivates the person to make the content in the first place. We've waited a year already, a few more months is not too much longer to wait
Can you make more my hero academia please:<
Nhentai really needs a reluctance tag, or at least expanding the use of the rape tag to stuff like this.

Don't get me wrong here I love this person work but I am just annoyed with him since he promised to send his new Boku no hero work this summer and it has already been a month into summer. STILL I love your work juna juna sensei and I hope you will give us Boku no hero work soon.
Waiting for Boku no harem Academia part 6
